title: [GAMEPLAY] Riot Girl Tristana - Emote Glitch
body:
Hello!

While playing a game with Riot Girl Tristana, I came upon a glitch in her taunt, joke, dance, laugh, idle, and recall animation. I asked my other teammates if they saw the glitch as well, and they said that when I performed an emote, my character appeared to be "floating".

After the game was done, I went to go test her other skins in a custom game. I only have Guerrilla and Buccaneer, and so far, those skins (including her classic) don't seemed to be affected by this bug. Only her Riot Girl skin.

While the glitch isn't very game breaking, it's a little distracting to watch. Even if it is a little funny as well. Here are some videos that I posted on my Youtube channel to better explain the bug.

Thank you in advance! ^^

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DT3bc8s9IHA 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ADaaRzVZiP0

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
Ok. Glad I could be of help. Thank you!
